<!-- Name -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
<legend>Nom</legend>
<label for="firstName">Prénom</label><input type="text" name="firstName" id="firstName" aria-required="true" data-ok="false" required><span class="error-msg" id="firstNameErr"></span>
</div>

<div class="form-row">
<label for="lastName">Nom</label><input type="text" name="lastName" id="lastName" aria-required="true" data-ok="false" required><span class="error-msg" id="lastNameErr"></span>
</fieldset>
</div>
<br>

<!-- University -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
<legend>Votre labo</legend>
<label for="University">Université</label><input type="text" name="University" id="University" aria-required="true" data-ok="false" required><span class="error-msg" id="UniversityErr"></span>
<label for="Supervisor">Nom de votre superviseur</label><input type="text" name="Supervisor" id="Supervisor" aria-required="true" data-ok="false" required>
</fieldset>
</div>
<br>

<!-- Email -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
<legend>Courriel</legend>
<input type="text" name="email" id="email" aria-required="true" data-ok="false" required><span class="error-msg" id="emailErr"></span>
</fieldset>
</div>
<br>

<!-- Status -->
<div class="form-row">
<fieldset aria-required="true">
<legend>Votre status</legend>
<input type="radio" id="masters" name="status" required="required" value="Master's student">
<label for="masters">Étudiant&middot;e à la maîtrise</label>
<input type="radio" id="phd" name="status" required="required" value="Ph.D. student">
<label for="phd">Étudiant&middot;e au doctorat</label>
<input type="radio" id="postdoc" name="status" required="required" value="Postdoctorate fellow">
<label for="postdoc">Postdoctorant&middot;e</label>
</fieldset>
</div>
<br>

<center> <button type="submit" class="btn" aria-disabled="true" aria-describedby="CSmemberErr"> Submit </button> </center>
</form>

</div>
